channel.title: [317] 2 QUESTIONS: Water2Lava and Teleport?
channel.description:
hi there, i use pk jad scape and have 2 questions
first: every water is lava, where Do I change that? Ive once read in class22.java but i cant find that in my client folder lol so where do i? Every time if I use the search option for it I just find topics where they say "use search button" lol...
I want one answer please...
2nd: My home teleport has a random coords... it always teleports me to edge but randomly 3097 3098 3099 or 4000 (<- x coord)
So I cant find the coords to change them in clickingmost.java... help me?

item.title: [317] 2 QUESTIONS: Water2Lava and Teleport?
item.dc:creator: @nelis92 nelis92
item.description:
@nelis92 wrote:

i dont know the lava stuff

for the teleport…
your home teleport got an case, spam click your telebutton, look into your cmd wich case has been clicked so much

go to your clickingmost.java and look for that case and change the cords.
proabably its misc.random(2) @ x cord

so if you cant find the case… look for 3097 3098 3099 or 4000… would’nt be to hard

Read full topic
